subsection.name: Content and Selected Value
subsection.p: When you set a value in the combo, nyx will set the selected value in the list accordingly. If the value is not found, it will set the selected value to the first entry in the list.

If you replace the content and in between the value is never set, it will try to use the current value to select the correct item. If the item is not in the list, it will reset the current value to be the first item.

subsection.name: Properties
subsection.p: This is a list of all supported, combo specific, properties. See the widget page for information about properties used for all widgets.
